ygData.subject: Re: Skull+Totem Staff combination
ygData.msgSnippet: The Jynn Thra skulls are so common.  If you have one in your bank or on hand you can t pick up more than one (they are lore items).  I gave one away to someone
ygData.messageBody:
The Jynn'Thra skulls are so common. If you have one in your bank or on
hand you can't pick up more than one (they are lore items). I gave one
away to someone I was selling a staff too.
Now how to combine them is unknown by everyone I ask. But I do believe
that there is a way that is either kept hush by Verant or isn't implemented
fully.

Zolthar

At 05:31 PM 5/13/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: Arshad Rahman <arahman@...>
>
>Which skull do you combine? The Jynn'Thra one (can't remember the exact
>name)? Any idea on how much it sells for?
>
>And yes, the stats on that skull are +20 mana, +3 SV magic.
>
